abstract: Medtronic said it would comply with the Justice Department’s investigation regarding its marketing and reimbursement advice to doctors concerning devices intended to control irregular heartbeats.
snippet: Medtronic said it would comply with the Justice Department’s investigation regarding its marketing and reimbursement advice to doctors concerning devices intended to control irregular heartbeats.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic said the Justice Department was investigating its marketing and reimbursement advice to doctors concerning devices intended to control irregular heartbeats.
